system_url.title: System URL
system_url.description: The base URL of the SAP Litmos instance. For example, https://api.litmos.com/v1.svc

apikey.title: API Key
apikey.description: The API Key is passed as a header and used for authenticating the API calls by the SAP Litmos system

source.title: Source
source.description: Free text description of your app. Usually a company or product name.

application_name.title: Application Name
application_name.description: The name of the Application CR where the REST APIS should be registered for consumption
